INST1: In this task, you will first see and memorize a short list of letters.  For example BN.  Once you have memorized the list, you will see a sequence of letters, and be asked to judge whether each one was or was not on the list.  Letters on the list should be indicated with the left shift key, letters not on the list with a right shift key.  Click below when you are ready to begin.
HEAD1: To be learned sequence.  Press any key to begin test.
DEBRIEF: The test is now complete. Hit OK to continue.
